name: Save The Artifacts !
description:
SAVE THE ARTIFACTS !

Save The Artifacts is a 3D Perspective Puzzle game about a boy saving Indonesian artifacts that had been stolen, to get the Artifacts, the boy must destroy all the obstacle. This game was made to take part in the GEMASTIK 2018 competition at the Institut Teknologi Sepuluh Nopember.

Our Team consist of : 

  • Alwi Muhammad   ->   Game Programmer
  • Alfin . H                       ->   Game Designer
  • M.Adha Fajri            ->   Game Artist

If you want to try this game on your mobile phone, please download the .apk file below. Thanks :D

Assets Credit

- Character Pack: Free Sample by SupercyanFrom Unity Asset Store
- Farland Skies - Cloudy Crown by BorodarFrom Unity Asset Store
- Casual Game BGM #5 by B.G.M from Unity Asset Store
- Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
- Low Poly 3D Block - Devils Work.shop by Ajay Karat
